Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface FlipFitUserDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitUserDAO
public interface FlipFitUserDAOInterface
Interface for FlipFit User DAO (Data Access Object). This interface defines methods for user-related operations, including adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting users.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addUser(FlipFitUser user)
    Adds a new user to the system.
    void
    deleteUser(int id)
    Deletes a user from the system based on their unique ID.
    List<FlipFitUser>
    getAllUsers()
    Retrieves a list of all users in the system.
    FlipFitUser
    getUserById(int id)
    Retrieves a user based on their unique ID.
    void
    updateUser(FlipFitUser user)
    Updates the details of an existing user.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      void addUser(FlipFitUser user)
      Adds a new user to the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The FlipFitUser object containing user details.

    • getUserById

      FlipFitUser getUserById(int id)
      Retrieves a user based on their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the user.
      Returns:
      A FlipFitUser object representing the user, or null if not found.

    • getAllUsers

      List<FlipFitUser> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves a list of all users in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitUser objects representing all users.

    • updateUser

      void updateUser(FlipFitUser user)
      Updates the details of an existing user.
      Parameters:
      user - The FlipFitUser object containing updated user details.

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser(int id)
      Deletes a user from the system based on their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the user to be deleted.
